gate.learning.learners

Class MultiClassLearning

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.learning.learners.MultiClassLearning

  • public class MultiClassLearning
extends Object
    Learning and application by converting the multi-class problem into several binary class problems.

    • Field Summary
